productDesc: Fabric upholstered bed base that includes two sets of different height legs to customise your bed height to your needs. FSC Wood components.
productDetailedDesc:
-This simple yet stylish Bed Base will enhance your bedroom decor.
-Perfect for use with the Queen Size Mattress in a Box, also on sale in our Bedroom Furniture theme.
-Includes 12 month warranty.
-Suitable for standard Australian Queen size mattress.
-Assembled size: 2.05m(L) x 1.55m(W) x 28.5cm(H) short legs / 34.5cm(H) tall legs.
-Box Size: approx. 2.01m(W) x 36cm(D) x 15cm(H).
-Box Weight: approx. 39kg.
productDeliveryReturnsDesc:
Delivery

Currently delivering to selected postcodes in NSW, VIC & QLD. Your order will be dispatched within 1-2 business days and you will receive order updates via email with tracking details.


Returns

While we hope you'll be happy with your order, you can return a product to your nearest store or contact us via email to arrange. To check if you are eligible for a refund please refer to our Returns Policy.
